body_html:
I see it now. Here's the link

https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/notes/windows.html

Import error
from torch.C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.
The problem is caused by the missing of the essential files. Actually, we include almost all the essential files that PyTorch need except VC2017 redistributable. You can resolve this by typing the following command.
conda install -c peterjc123 vc vs2017_runtime

Since I'm using pip install I cannot use the conda command. And torch loads in conda anyway.

This morning I installed the latest VC2017 redistributable which is version 14.14.26429, to try out your workaround, but the problem remains. Do you have more details?

body:
I see it now.   Here's the link

https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/notes/windows.html

> Import error
from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.
The problem is caused by the missing of the essential files. Actually, we include almost all the essential files that PyTorch need except VC2017 redistributable. You can resolve this by typing the following command.
conda install -c peterjc123 vc vs2017_runtime_

Since I'm using pip install I cannot use the conda command.    And torch loads in conda anyway.

This morning I installed the latest VC2017 redistributable which is version 14.14.26429, to try out your workaround, but the problem remains.    Do you have more details?
